original_text: (The Pharisees and all the Jews do not eat unless they give their hands a ceremonial washing, holding to the tradition of the elders.
korean_text: (바리새인들과 모든 유대인들은 장로들의 전통을 지키어 손을 잘 씻지 않고서는 음식을 먹지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees and all the Jews
unless they give their hands a ceremonial washing
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그들의 손을 의식적으로 씻지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: holding to the tradition of the elders
